item.title: For Fans By Fans: Digital Stars Fan Forge Challenge Begins!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description:
Hello vocalsynth fans! We are thrilled to announce once more the opportunity for you to flex your artistic muscles with the newest Fan Forge challenge hosted by For Fans By Fans! For those who are new to Fan Forge, it is an open gallery where artists submit their fan art to get the chance to …

The post For Fans By Fans: Digital Stars Fan Forge Challenge Begins! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hello vocalsynth fans! We are thrilled to announce once more the opportunity for you to flex your artistic muscles with the newest Fan Forge challenge hosted by For Fans By Fans! For those who are new to Fan Forge, it is an open gallery where artists submit their fan art to get the chance to become official licensed products. Selected artwork will earn a commission rate per item sold on the For Fans By Fans website, through wholesale, and at conventions!

Guidelines

You need to be 18 years or older, or have parental or guardian consent in order to enter into the challenge.
Submissions are open internationally!

All you need to do is design something original, creative, and inspired by any of the Piapro characters! This includes Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len, Megurine Luka, KAITO, and MEIKO.

No overtly sexual designs are allowed, and use of other costumes created by other artists is not permitted.

Prizes

Grand Prize Winner (x1): A Hatsune Miku Magical Mirai 2020 Nendoroid, $500 cash, and DX Gift Pack courtesy of Crypton Future Media

Runner-Up Prize Winners (x2): $250 cash prize, and Gift Pack courtesy of Crypton Future Media

We wish the absolute best of luck to everyone who enters! You can check out the promotion website for more details and to submit your design, located here.

The post For Fans By Fans: Digital Stars Fan Forge Challenge Begins! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: For Fans By Fans: Miku Expo 2021 Online Fan Forge Design Winners Announced!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description:
Hello once more Vocaloid fans! We are thrilled to announce the winners of the Hatsune Miku “Globe Challenge” held by For Fans By Fans, with designs being sold on the website as of May 26, 2021! All sales on designs support the original creators. Link provided here! So let’s take a look at the “Globe …

The post For Fans By Fans: Miku Expo 2021 Online Fan Forge Design Winners Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hello once more Vocaloid fans! We are thrilled to announce the winners of the Hatsune Miku “Globe Challenge” held by For Fans By Fans, with designs being sold on the website as of May 26, 2021!

All sales on designs support the original creators. Link provided here!

So let’s take a look at the “Globe Challenge” winners!

Grand Prize Winner: Miku World by Calicocat

Runner Up Winner: “The World Created By Hatsune Miku” By 氷菓子(カナ)

Runner Up Winner: “World Star” by Kengabr

Many congratulations are in order to the winners of the contest as well as everyone who has participated in the event! As always, please show these creators your love and support to their designs and take a look at the entire For Fans by Fans Hatsune Miku collection while you’re at it!

http://bit.ly/VNN_GLOBE

The post For Fans By Fans: Miku Expo 2021 Online Fan Forge Design Winners Announced! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: For Fans By Fans: Miku Expo 2021 Online Fan Forge Challenge!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description:
We are excited to announce that For Fans By Fans have partnered along Miku Expo to celebrate Miku Expo Online this year with a Fan Forge Challenge! The theme represented will be “GLOBE”. If you’re looking to participate, you’ll have the chance to win many rewards! GLOBE Challenge Guidelines You must be 18 years or …

The post For Fans By Fans: Miku Expo 2021 Online Fan Forge Challenge! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
We are excited to announce that For Fans By Fans have partnered along Miku Expo to celebrate Miku Expo Online this year with a Fan Forge Challenge! The theme represented will be “GLOBE”. If you’re looking to participate, you’ll have the chance to win many rewards!

GLOBE Challenge Guidelines

You must be 18 years or older or have a guardian’s permission to participate. Submissions are open to all countries.

Your task is to design something original and creative inspired by any of the official Piapro characters – “Hatsune Miku”, “Kagamine Rin”, “Kagamine Len”, “Megurine Luka”, “KAITO”, and “MEIKO”.

Mash-ups or cross-overs are not permitted, and you are not allowed to submit any overtly sexual designs.

Your own take on costumes is encouraged but you are not to use costumes made by other artists in the community.

Prizes!

The Grand Prize winner will receive a Snow Miku Nendoroid, a set of For Fans By Fans’ adorable Record Scratcher pins and a DX Gift Pack courtesy of Crypton Future Media.

The Runner-Up Prize winners will receive a set of For Fans By Fans’ Record Scratcher pins and a Gift Pack courtesy of Crypton Future Media.

Also, all prize winners will get a commission on all sales of their design work!

If you are interested in joining the contest to submit your entry, checking the guidelines, or finding out more about Fan Forge, please check out http://bit.ly/MIKUEXPO-GLOBE! We hope to see all your amazing entries in this contest and a best of luck to you who submit your design!

The post For Fans By Fans: Miku Expo 2021 Online Fan Forge Challenge! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: VOCALOID Collection ~Winter 2020~ Fan Festival Announced!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description:
Hello fellow Vocaloid fans! Dwango Co., Ltd, the operator of Japan’s social video website, Niconico, has announced details for the VOCALOID Collection ~Winter 2020~! It is set as an online convention, slated to be held on December 11 – December 13, 2020. Events The VOCALOID Collection LIVE The VOCALOID Collection LIVE is a music concert …

The post VOCALOID Collection ~Winter 2020~ Fan Festival Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hello fellow Vocaloid fans! Dwango Co., Ltd, the operator of Japan’s social video website, Niconico, has announced details for the VOCALOID Collection ~Winter 2020~! It is set as an online convention, slated to be held on December 11 – December 13, 2020.

Events

The VOCALOID Collection LIVE

The VOCALOID Collection LIVE is a music concert which will comprise of DJ shows and band programs, performed by popular artists including Hachioji P and Pinnochio P. The concert takes place on December 12th (Saturday), and will be divided into two sections: the first section will contain Vocaloid classics from 2009-2014, while the second section will cover Vocaloid trending music from 2015-2020.

Dates: December 12th (Saturday), 2020
Part 1: OPEN 12:00 JST, START 13:00 JST
Part 2: OPEN 17:30 JST, START 18:30 JST

Venue: Toyosu PIT (6-1-23, Toyosu, Koto-ku, Tokyo, Japan)

Price: Onsite Tickets
Part 1: 5,500 Yen (Tax Incl.)
Part 2: 5,500 Yen (Tax Incl.)
Both Part 1 and 2: 9,800 Yen (Tax Incl.)
Online Tickets
Part 1: 4,500 Yen (Tax Incl.)
Part 2: 4,500 Yen (Tax Incl.)
Both Part 1 and 2: 8,500 Yen (Tax Incl.)

Performer List:

  • Part 1: Kozue Aikawa, ＋α Alphakyun., 164, Iripon Sensei, Kamen Liar 217, koma’n, SHARE LOCK HOMES, Tsubasa Harihara (HarryP), PinocchioP, Heavenz, Miume, melochin, Sachiko Kobayashi, Kettaro, Tsukasashi, nero, NORISTRY, Rio
  • Part 2: ARIKU, Iripon Sensei, Will, Kamen Liar 217, Kanzawa Arisa, SHARE LOCK HOMES, john/TOOBOE, TUYU, DJ’TEKINA//SOMETHING a.k.a Yuyoyuppe, Hachioji P, Porushi, metre, melochin

Both online viewing and onsite viewing (at the physical venue) tickets can be purchased at Dwango Ticket.

Live Streaming Programs

Throughout the festival, there will be live streaming programs held, of which in particular include:

  • Talk shows
  • Outdoor DJ performances by popular Vocaloid P
  • A rebroadcast of Vocaloid music concerts held at Niconico Cho Party.
  • Introductory classes for Vocaloid music production!

Vocaloid Video Ranking Contest!

Niconico will be hosting a ranking contest while the event is taking place for Vocaloid videos posted by users! There will be 4 categories in the contest.

  1. Vocaloid Collection TOP 30 Ranking
  2. Vocaloid Collection REMIX Ranking
  3. Vocaloid Collection Rookie Ranking
  4. Derivative Works Ranking

The criteria for ranking includes views, comments, My Lists, and likes. Videos that make it to top ranking will then be featured in the official live stream show, and creators are eligible for cash prizes from Vocaloid Collection sponsors (details to be released on a later date). It will be open to all voice synth software, including: VOCALOID, UTAU, CeVIO, VOICEROID, NEUTRINO, SynthV, and Hatsune Miku NT.

Of note, the submission period for all ranking contests is: Dec. 11th (Friday) 0:00 JST – Dec. 13th (Sunday) 19:59 JST.
The contest will accept new videos only, and reuploads will not be included in the ranking.

Vocaloid Collection TOP 30 Ranking

  • Upload your original Vocaloid (or other voice synthesizer) music to the Music/Sound category on Niconico.
  • Tag the video with “ボカコレ2020冬” and lock it.

Vocaloid Collection REMIX Ranking

  • Upload your remix video based on original Vocaloid (or other voice synthesizer) music to the Music/Sound category on Niconico.
  • Tag the video with “ボカコレ2020冬REMIX” and lock it.

Vocaloid Collection Rookie Ranking

  • Rookie Ranking applies to new Vocaloid P, those who have uploaded their work no more than 2 years ago.
  • Upload your original Vocaloid (or other voice synthesizer) music to the Music/Sound category on NicoNico.
  • Tag the video with “ボカコレ2020冬ルーキー” and lock it.

Derivative Works Ranking

  • Consists of 3 genres:
    • Me Singing
    • Me Dancing
    • Me Playing
  • Upload your video based on original Vocaloid (or other voice synthesizer) music to Music/Sound or Dance categories on Niconico.
  • Tag the video with the designated tag as appropriate for the genre.
    • Me Singing Ranking: “歌ってみた”
    • Me Dancing Ranking: “踊ってみた”
    • Me Playing Ranking: “演奏してみた”

Stem Files for Remix are available from Popular Vocaloid P’s!

Producers such as ryo (supercell) and kz (livetune) will be sharing music stems from their original Vocaloid songs so users can make their own remixes. These will be available to download at Vocaloid Collection’s official website.

Those who make it to the top ranking with their remixes are going to be featured on the official live streamed event!

Artists Sharing Stem Files: ryo (supercell), kz (livetune), PinocchioP, ika, Omoi, Kairiki bear, Carlos Hakamada (SizeP), KurousaP, Surii, DECO*27, NayutalieN, Harumaki Gohan, buzzG, Hiiragi Kirai, and more!

To participate: Upload your remix to Niconico and tag it with “ボカコレ2020冬REMIX”. (We were not given information if you need to file it under the Music/Sound category, or lock the video itself).

40 Hours of Nonstop Vocaloid Music

What a party! Starting on Dec. 11th (Friday) at 23:00 JST, Niconico will stream a 40 hour Vocaloid music show consisting of three sections.

  1. Vocaloid Collection TOP 30 Cruise
  2. Vocaloid All Time Best Cruise (featuring iconic Vocaloid music)
  3. User Request Cruise (music requested by users)

User Playlist Recommendations

During the event period, Niconico wants users to submit their own Vocaloid playlist to have the opportunity to be featured on the Vocaloid Collection’s official website.

To participate: Submit a playlist of at least 10 Vocaloid (or other voice synthesizer) songs created using Niconico’s My List function and post the URL on Twitter with the hashtag #私のプレイリスト and #ボカコレ.

…But what about merch??

The BOOTH Festival Vocaloid Collection

International indie art marketplace, BOOTH, is hosting the BOOTH FESTIVAL Vocaloid Collection – an online convention dedicated to Vocaloid merchandise! During the Vocaloid Collection event, creators will sell their indie music CDs, comics, photo books, and more on a dedicated webpage.

If you’re a creator and want to apply for participation before or during the event, check the official website for more details.

Get Hyped for Vocaloid Collection ~Winter 2020~!

With so much to do, you’ll find there’s something for everyone to enjoy! I’m happy that there’s a lot of emphasis towards user generated content, as you can see with the multitude of different contests that will take place. Let us know what will you check out in this festival!

Links

  • Vocaloid Collection ~Winter 2020~
  • Vocaloid Collection Official Twitter
  • Vocaloid Collection Live: Tickets
  • Niconico
  • BOOTH Festival: Vocaloid Collection

The post VOCALOID Collection ~Winter 2020~ Fan Festival Announced! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Meiko’s 15th Anniversary Illustration Collaboration Recruitment!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description:
General Details MEIKO celebrated her 15th Anniversary on November 5, 2019. As per this announcement on the Hatsune Miku official blog, though a variety of goods and events have been already conducted, Piapro will be opening a collaboration for illustrators to participate in! Prizes The artistic works that have been chosen for adoption will be …

The post Meiko’s 15th Anniversary Illustration Collaboration Recruitment! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
General Details

MEIKO celebrated her 15th Anniversary on November 5, 2019. As per this announcement on the Hatsune Miku official blog, though a variety of goods and events have been already conducted, Piapro will be opening a collaboration for illustrators to participate in!

Prizes

The artistic works that have been chosen for adoption will be awarded with MEIKO goods! As well, your art will be showcased at various Crypton Future Media events!

Participation Rules

Winners will be selected around this July of 2020, with the announcement being made on the Piapro site and via email.

You must be registered on Piapro – if you don’t have an account yet, you can sign up here. In addition, you must follow the terms and conditions of Piapro and the application rules of this collaboration.

Illustration Content

You must include the main character, MEIKO in your piece.

In addition, you can optionally include side characters: from Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len, Megurine Luka, and KAITO.

Post Format

  • Size: 29.7cm (Height) x 42cm (Width) – “A3 Horizontal Size”
  • Format: PNG or JPEG format
  • Color Mode: RGB
  • Resolution: 300 dpi or higher

Additional Notes

Your illustration must not contain any text, with the exception of attaching characters’ specific number logos to their arms (example: Hatsune Miku’s iconic “01″).

Derived characters, such as Snow Miku, Miku Dayo, cannot be utilized.

  • Character costumes that are drawn on official product packages are OK
  • Costumes appearing in games, anime, manga, etc. are not permitted.

Your posted work must be listed as a “Post without license” to prevent it from being used in other collaborations until a decision has been made for this one.

Conclusion

Many best wishes to those of you who choose to participate in the collaboration, and I hope you can get selected as a winner!

Links

Announcement (Blog)

Contest Information

Contest Details

The post Meiko’s 15th Anniversary Illustration Collaboration Recruitment! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “MIKU EXPO 2020 USA & Canada” Illustration Contest Winners Announced!

The theme used for this contest was “Rock“, which brought together artists from all over the globe to send in their best designs of our beloved …

The post “MIKU EXPO 2020 USA & Canada” Illustration Contest Winners Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The winners of the “MIKU EXPO 2020 USA & Canada” illustration contest at “For Fans by Fans” (formerly WeLoveFine), which was introduced in a recent blog post, have been officially announced!

The theme used for this contest was “Rock“, which brought together artists from all over the globe to send in their best designs of our beloved Hatsune Miku to have a chance at winning amazing prizes!

All of the winners can be found below:

Grand Prix (1st Place)

 

Second Grand Prix (2nd Place)

 

To the Beat of 2020 by Lucas Prokopowich

And for the honorable mentions:

MIKU EXPO Awards

 

 

 

The award-winning illustrations will be sold online around mid March 2020 as tour official collaboration merchandise!

Sources

HATSUNE MIKU 2020 USA & Canada Official Website (English)

HATSUNE MIKU EXPO Official Twitter Account (English)

The post “MIKU EXPO 2020 USA & Canada” Illustration Contest Winners Announced! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Fan Forge Miku Expo 2020 US & Canada Design Contest is Here!
item.dc:creator: Momoi
item.description:
Fan Forge has partnered with Crypton Future Media again and will be announcing a new merchandise design challenge to celebrate the US & Canada tour for MIKU EXPO 2020! Contest Details Launch Date: January 9th, 2020 Deadline: February 10th, 2020 Design Theme: ROCK! Now this theme is vaguely similar to the “CYBERPUNK” theme of Miku …

The post Fan Forge Miku Expo 2020 US & Canada Design Contest is Here! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Fan Forge has partnered with Crypton Future Media again and will be announcing a new merchandise design challenge to celebrate the US & Canada tour for MIKU EXPO 2020!

Contest Details

Launch Date: January 9th, 2020

Deadline: February 10th, 2020

Design Theme: ROCK!
Now this theme is vaguely similar to the “CYBERPUNK” theme of Miku Expo 2020 Europe. However, this allows competitors to really put their imagination to work! What will your interpretation of Miku’s “ROCK” be?

Prizes:

  1. Two tickets to any MIKU EXPO 2020 USA & CANADA Show (Travel Not Included) – OR – A 5-Item Tour Goods Present Package
  2. Two runners up will receive a Special Miku Tour Goods Package!

Furthermore, all selected designs will receive a commission on every sale of their work! So even if your design doesn’t quite hit first place, you’ll still be able to put your design out there and reap the rewards!

Sources

Are you going to enter the contest? Or will you be supporting it from the outside? Best of luck to those of you who enter, and be sure to support the creators if you don’t!

The official page for the contest is here!


Fan Forge can be found on Twitter, Facebook and their official website!
Hatsune Miku is on Facebook (English and Japanese), Twitter (English and Japanese), Youtube and Weibo!

The post Fan Forge Miku Expo 2020 US & Canada Design Contest is Here! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Miku Expo Europe 2020 Fan Forge Contest Winners Announced!
item.dc:creator: Jade Kaiba
item.description:
We have previously reported the announcement of the Miku Expo Europe 2020 Fan Forge contest and, today, the winners of the contest have been announced! This contest’s theme was Cyberpunk and there were so many amazing entries! Let’s take a look at the winners. Winning Entries The winner of the Grand Prize is ‘bot‘ by …

The post Miku Expo Europe 2020 Fan Forge Contest Winners Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
We have previously reported the announcement of the Miku Expo Europe 2020 Fan Forge contest and, today, the winners of the contest have been announced!

This contest’s theme was Cyberpunk and there were so many amazing entries! Let’s take a look at the winners.

Winning Entries

The winner of the Grand Prize is ‘bot‘ by L LL.

The Runner-up prize winners are ‘Cyber Vaporwave‘ by Noriko Hayashi and ‘Cyberpunk HASTUNE MIKU EXPO 2020 EUROPE‘ by 風船猫

And, finally, the Miku Expo Award winners are ‘Double life‘ by Bib Boss and ‘CYBER LIVE!!‘ by Nyan.

Congratulations to all the winners and thank you to all who entered for your hard work!

To see all the entries that were submitted to the contest, you can check them out here.

And remember, the winning entries shall be made into merchandise that will be available to buy online soon, so stay tuned for further updates!

Source

Miku Expo Official Twitter

The post Miku Expo Europe 2020 Fan Forge Contest Winners Announced! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: LIVEDAM Ai x Piapro Collaboration Announced!
item.dc:creator: Jade Kaiba
item.description:
From today, Piapro is collaborating with LIVE DAM Ai to find 200 illustrations that will be used as background images in karaoke videos! LIVE DAM is a karaoke machine which features live videos and sound which aims to recreate the experience of singing in a live venue.   Contest Prizes 200 illustrations shall be selected …

The post LIVEDAM Ai x Piapro Collaboration Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
From today, Piapro is collaborating with LIVE DAM Ai to find 200 illustrations that will be used as background images in karaoke videos!

LIVE DAM is a karaoke machine which features live videos and sound which aims to recreate the experience of singing in a live venue.

 

Contest Prizes

200 illustrations shall be selected to be used as background images in the karaoke videos.

But that’s not all! There will also be prizes given to all the winners!

The prize categories are to be divided into 1 Grand Prize, 3 Excellence prizes and the remaining 196 prizes.

The Grand Prize includes 100,000 JPY and an A4 tapestry featuring the illustration of the Grand Prize winner.

For the 3 Excellence prizes, the winners shall each receive 30,000 JPY and an A4 size tapestry of their winning illustration.

And last but not least, the remaining 196 winners will receive an A4 tapestry of the winning illustration.

How to Apply

Applications shall be accepted from 17:00 JST on November 6th, 2019, to 17:00 JST on January 13th, 2020. The results are set to be announced in February 2020.

You must have a Piapro account to apply for this contest.

Here are some rules to be aware of before applying:

  • The illustration you submit must be in JPEG or PNG format and should be the following size 1920 x 1080, at a resolution of 300 dpi or higher.
  • The target characters for the illustrations are Miku, Rin, Len, Luka, Meiko or Kaito and single or multiple characters will be accepted.
  • Please make sure that you only use original designs or official product designs. Notably, derivative designs will not be accepted, such as Snow Miku and Miku Dayo. Do not use designs from other media, such as games, anime or manga.
  • Please make sure that you do not use license terms on your entry and that you include the DAM2020_illustration tag.

To read the full list of rules, check out the list here.

When you are ready to submit your entry, you can start the application process here. (Please login before using this link)

All the successfully submitted entries shall show up on this page here.

Good luck to everyone who is thinking of entering the contest! We hope to see your artwork soon!

Source

Piapro Official Blog

LIVE DAM Ai x Piapro Collaboration Page 

The post LIVEDAM Ai x Piapro Collaboration Announced! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Piapro Announces Questionnaire Contest for Meiko’s 15th Anniversary!
item.dc:creator: Jade Kaiba
item.description:
November 5th, 2019 is Meiko‘s 15th anniversary and Crypton Future Media has announced a contest to win some amazing Meiko merchandise! Before we get into the details of the contest, take a look at all the lovely gifts that Crypton have received from Meiko fans to celebrate the occasion. There are so many dedicated fans! …

The post Piapro Announces Questionnaire Contest for Meiko’s 15th Anniversary! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
November 5th, 2019 is Meiko‘s 15th anniversary and Crypton Future Media has announced a contest to win some amazing Meiko merchandise!

Before we get into the details of the contest, take a look at all the lovely gifts that Crypton have received from Meiko fans to celebrate the occasion. There are so many dedicated fans!

 

Contest Details

The contest is very simple! All you need to do to enter is fill out this questionnaire by 23:59 on Tuesday, November 12th.

10 lucky winners shall then be selected to receive one of the prizes on offer.

Winners shall be informed via email, from an address ending with @crypton.co.jp

The prizes you could win include:

  • Meiko Cosplay and Wig (Size S)
  • Meiko Plush
  • Meiko Cushion
  • Meiko Wallet
  • Meiko Card Case
  • Meiko Key Case
  • Meiko Multi-purpose Pouch
  • Meiko Can Badges
  • Meiko Keychains
  • And more!

Check out the picture below to take a closer look at the various prizes!

Remember, if you want to have a chance of winning one of these lovely prizes, you must fill out the questionnaire here.

Good luck to everyone who enters and, as always, keep your eyes peeled for more news from VNN!

Source

Piapro Official Blog

The post Piapro Announces Questionnaire Contest for Meiko’s 15th Anniversary! appeared first on VNN.
